pros: It is part of the triple accredited Henley Business School and it has developed courses that balance core theory and practitioner experience.
cons: Very challenging schedule which requires hours of study and preparation on a daily basis.

pros: Great environment; friendly boss; flexible with timings; huge database for research; one of the best place to do research in finance
cons: not in any particular which I can think of now, probably, its not very high rated in the industry which it should be, so I would say, under valued in the industry

pros: The business school provides trading rooms with Bloomberg and Reuters terminals. Focus is on financial markets and practical implementation of theoretical concepts.
cons: The reputation of the business school is not as good as top UK business schools. Fees for a postgraduate degree are quite high.

pros: ICMA centre is a professional and friendly research institution. I very much enjoyed study and work at ICMA centre in the last three years.
cons: The administration work can be improved, thought it is quite organised now.

pros: Great friendly environment to work in
cons: Reading itself can be an acquired taste
